channel.title: Posts on Own Your Game
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Own Your Game

item.title: Good Coaches Gone Corporate
item.description: We’re all told at some point in time that we can no longer play the children’s game, we just don’t know when that’s gonna be. Some of us are told at eighteen, some of us are told at forty, but we’re all told. - Moneyball (Movie) One of the saddest things to see in baseball and sports in general is the end of a career (playing or coaching) after someone has invested their life into the sport.
